video.title: The Hardy Boys Nancy Drew Mysteries
video.synopsis: Famous literary teen sleuths spring to life in this series that shifts focus between a detecting duo and a comely part-time investigator.

episodes.synopsis: The Hardy boys visit Captain Maguire, who has disappeared to a place called Witches' Hollow. Only a mute artist can help them solve the mystery.
episodes.title: The Mystery of Witches' Hollow

episodes.synopsis: While the Hardy boys are helping their father, a UFO sighting leads them to an out-of-the-way estate in which everything seems like an illusion.
episodes.title: The Disappearing Floor

episodes.synopsis: The Hardy boys find a rare jade statue, which leads them into an underworld of smugglers. To protect a group from extortion, the boys investigate.
episodes.title: Secret of Jade Kwan Yin

episodes.synopsis: While flying a glider, Nancy sees an automobile drive off the road into a ravine. When Nancy makes her way to the gully, there's no trace of the car.
episodes.title: Mystery of the Diamond Triangle

episodes.synopsis: When Nancy's home is burglarized, Nancy is determined to find out why someone might be trying to make her and her aunt believe the house is haunted.
episodes.title: Secret of the Whispering Walls

episodes.synopsis: When Nancy revives a play that's rumored to be haunted, five members of the original cast return. But their presence heightens Nancy's suspicions.
episodes.title: A Haunting We Will Go

episodes.synopsis: When Nancy witnesses a robbery at a carnival, she poses as a runaway and joins the carnival to infiltrate a gang of bikers and catch the thief.
episodes.title: Mystery of the Fallen Angels

episodes.synopsis: Nancy discovers a college football team player standing over a body and holding a possible murder weapon. But Nancy won't rest until there's proof.
episodes.title: Mystery of the Solid Gold Kicker

episodes.synopsis: When sleuths attending a gathering of gumshoes begin to vanish while touring a Hollywood movie studio, the Hardy Boys and Nancy Drew investigate.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Hollywood Phantom - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Hollywood Phantom demands $500,000 for his captives. During a rescue attempt, Nancy falls into a lake, where a mechanical shark attacks her.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Hollywood Phantom - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: In Kenya, the Hardy boys and their father try to learn who might be responsible for an elaborate poaching operation -- and put a stop to it.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the African Safari

episodes.synopsis: When a girl thinks her boyfriend was abducted by aliens, the Hardys wonder if there's a link between his disappearance and a government test site.
episodes.title: The Creatures Who Came from Sunday

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Joe mistakenly deliver a document into the wrong hands, causing serious problems for their father. Can they reverse their blunder?
episodes.title: Acapulco Spies

episodes.synopsis: Nancy's ex-classmate Karen is accused of a jewel theft. At the behest of Karen's dad, Nancy and George go undercover to catch the real crook.
episodes.title: Nancy's Drew's Love Match

episodes.synopsis: When Nancy learns of a plot to assassinate the prime minister of Britain, she attempts to foil the plan with the help of a retired boxing champion.
episodes.title: The Lady on Thursday at Ten

episodes.synopsis: Frank and Joe try to protect a psychic who is drawn to an old house and is at risk from angry townsfolk. Later, they reopen an unsolved murder case.
episodes.title: The House on Possessed Hill

episodes.synopsis: Joe awakens in a hospital, only to be informed that he's been in a coma -- and that his brother and father have died. But he suspects it's all a ruse.
episodes.title: Sole Survivor

episodes.synopsis: Joe and Frank learn that Nancy is being held prisoner. They make a plan to rescue her, but their efforts are challenged by an arson attempt.
episodes.title: Arson and Old Lace

episodes.synopsis: When Joe's ex-girlfriend calls with the eerie news that some of her college classmates have gone missing, the Hardy boys go undercover to investigate.
episodes.title: The Campus Terror

episodes.synopsis: The Hardy boys are sidetracked on a mission to find their father when Frank disappears, and Joe is forced to seek help from British intelligence.
episodes.title: Assault on the Tower

episodes.synopsis: The Hardy boys go undercover in Greece to investigate a drug smuggling ring. But strange occurrences may lead them to solve an even bigger case.
episodes.title: Search for Atlantis

episodes.synopsis: The case of a missing girl brings Frank and Joe Hardy to the French Caribbean, where they encounter pirates and enlist the help of a French detective.
episodes.title: Dangerous Waters

episodes.synopsis: The Hardy boys are in Puerto Rico, where they're charged with shielding the daughter of a politician from an assassin known only as The Scorpion.
episodes.title: Scorpion's Sting
